alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 4:23AM CDT until June 10 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Saline County in central Arkansas... Central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 423 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Little Rock, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Argenta... Burns Park... Gravel Ridge... Marche... Chenal Valley... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Protho Junction... Gibson... Sweet Home... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
